arm_group.description: treatment of bilateral maxillofacial post-traumatic deformities

brief_summary.textblock:
Combined application of surgery planning software and rapid prototyping technology and
      preshaped titanium plates can effectively promote the accuracy of the diagnosis and
      treatment of bilateral maxillofacial post traumatic deformities, reduce operation time and
      improve surgical effect.

clinical_study.brief_title: Treatment of Bilateral Maxillofacial Post-traumatic Deformities

detailed_description.textblock:
All patients underwent preoperative CT scan. Firstly, SurgiCase were used to analyze CT data
      and design preliminary surgery plans. Secondly, three-dimensions resin skull models were
      produced by rapid prototyping technology. Model surgeries were performed to determine the
      location, reduction direction and shift distance of osteotomy. Based on the surgical
      simulation, the preliminary surgery plans were validated and optimized. Then, the titanium
      plates and mesh were preshaped on the models. Finally, according to the final surgery plans
      the operations were performed. The operation time, therapeutic effects and complications
      were observed. The follow-up periods were 1-12 months.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Bilateral maxillofacial Post-traumatic Deformities

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  unilateral maxillofacialPost-traumatic Deformities

study_pop.textblock: patients with Bilateral maxillofacial Post-traumatic Deformities

intervention.description: Rapid prototyping technology was applied in treatment of bilateral maxillofacial post-traumatic deformities

link.description: The West China Hospital of Stomatology has long been ranked as one of the national top hospitals in China

clinical_study.official_title: Application of Surgery Planning Software, Rapid Prototyping Model and Preshaped Titanium Plates in Treatment of Bilateral Maxillofacial Post-traumatic Deformities

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery, West China Hospital of Stomatology, Sichuan University

primary_outcome.description: The follow-ups showed that the degree of mouth opening of all patients were over 30mm.
